short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Secure password generation and evaluation tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Strong random password generator and evaluator allows you to create a strong password and test existing passwords against brute force attacks of varying levels. 
Allows for a range of characters up to 100. 
Allows selection of different types of character, upper, lower case, letter first etc. 
Save settings in browser storage. 

Nothing from this app is sent to any server or third party
